Sequence Information.Family: Derived from the peptide Lasioglossin LL-III
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19591185]Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis (MIC=0.6 μM), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=2.2 μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=1.4 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=27.1 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.19591185]LC50=55.1 μM against rat red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria. Has hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: Lasioglossins Three Novel Antimicrobial Peptides from the Venom of the Eusocial Bee Lasioglossum laticeps (Hymenoptera Halictidae.
Literature.Author: Cerovský V, Budesínský M, Hovorka O, Cvacka J, Voburka Z, Slaninová J, Borovicková L, Fucík V, Bednárová L, Votruba I, Straka J.
